ComicInfo.Series: Hellboy and the B.P.R.D.: The Return of Effie Kolb
ComicInfo.Summary: The Return of Effie Kolb Part 1 of 2: An old ally of Hellboy's introduces him to Sara May Blackburn, rumored to be a witch, who has had a premonition of something evil. Hellboy and the girl venture out into the woods to investigate.
